body_html:
Hmm, possibly one reasonable fix is to add our own version of AbsPath() here:
https://github.com/tensorflow/tensorflow/blob/master/tensorflow/core/lib/io/path.h

And expose it in gfile:
https://github.com/tensorflow/tensorflow/blob/master/tensorflow/python/platform/gfile.py

We can't really rely on os.path.abspath() unfortunately, because we support arbitrary filesystems and use URIs for paths.

body:
Hmm, possibly one reasonable fix is to add our own version of AbsPath() here:
https://github.com/tensorflow/tensorflow/blob/master/tensorflow/core/lib/io/path.h

And expose it in gfile:
https://github.com/tensorflow/tensorflow/blob/master/tensorflow/python/platform/gfile.py

We can't really rely on os.path.abspath() unfortunately, because we support arbitrary filesystems and use URIs for paths.
